eecs.jago.element
Class SimElement

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--eecs.jago.element.SimElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
VisibleElement
public abstract class SimElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

The basic object from which everything in a simulation is derived. This abstract class defines the absolute minimum functionality that all elements in a simulation must have. In general, they must have a location and the ability to react to simulation events.

Nested Class Summary
 class SimElement.TimerListener
          A class to manage timer events.

getArea

public java.awt.geom.Area getArea()
Returns a copy of the shape of this SimElement, as an Area. If the SimElement does not support the Area model, will return the bounding rectangle.

Overrides:

createArea

protected void createArea()
Creates the shape of this object. The default shape is a Rectangle2D, so this method should be overridden for any objects with a non-rectangular shape.

runTaskStep

protected void runTaskStep()
The tasks to execute during a single time step of the simulation.
